title: Can someone identify the font used in this book title?
content:
What font is the title "Venetian Mask" written in?

Thanks!  
M

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [400000000000000081369\_s3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100314030126/http:/typophile.com/files/400000000000000081369_s3_0.jpg) | 12.08 KB |
author: marcil

comments.content: Do you mean the cursive initials, or the rest?

The initials are from [Flemish Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20100314030126/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/bitstream/flemish_script_regular_ot/?&sample_text=V%20M%20&sample_size=144&update=0), whether or not you wanted to know.

Hereâ€™s [a larger image](http://web.archive.org/web/20100314030126/http:/ebooks-imgs.connect.com/ebooks/product/400/000/000/000/000/081/369/400000000000000081369_s4.jpg).  
By the way, [this version is so much better](http://web.archive.org/web/20100314030126/http:/www.fantasticfiction.co.uk/l/rosalind-laker/venetian-mask.htm).
